job_history.work_description: Fill all scheduled and stat patient orders. Process all refill requests in Care Connection, charge patient, print, and fill patient order. Fill all code carts, clot boxes, or any other emergency drug kits. Take inventory of all batched IV compounds based on set par levels and drug stability. Answer phone calls to assist Pharmacists in resolving any questions or problems that do not require and RPh. Compound all routine IV order while paying special attention to all STAT IV orders that are extremely time sensitive in severe situations. Compound any chemotherapy orders using appropriate personal protective equipment, correct supplies for closed-system compounding, and correct calculations for appropriate dosage.

Fill unit dose medications, as well as compounding admixtures STAT orders for patients. Prepare and refill the anesthesia, epidural, and crash cart trays to be replaced in carts. Collect and prepare all medications and patient orders for Pyxis. Refill the Pyxis machine with correct medications, pull all outdated medications, as well as returns/discontinued patient medications. Sterile compounding of all IV fluids using aseptic technique.

Compound all intravenous admixtures using proper sterilization techniques. Correctly label all IV compounds with accurate patient, drug, and facility information. Scan all orders to designated totes sorted by facility. Restock all supplies used for orders and place an order with purchaser for any items that are low in stock.

job_history.role_name: Control Technician/Control EDK Technician/Fill Floor Technician
job_history.work_description: Control Technician- Fill and send narcotic prescription orders for patients. Take inventory of all narcotics on hand everyday. Control EDK Technician- Take inventory of all returned narcotic Emergency Drug Kits, document all drugs removed by nursing facilities, and replenish missing drugs in each box. Fill floor technician-Fill and send prescriptions orders for patients, as well as non-sterile compounding of topical and oral medications.

Verify prescription, count medication, label, and dispense. Type and process new prescriptions. Ordering medication through warehouse or McKesson. Troubleshooting insurance problems. Comprehensive knowledge about HIPAA laws.

Successful leader, equally effective as member of a team. Highly organized able to multi-task and accomplish multiple objectives. Professional demeanor and attentive to detail. Expertise in coordinating and supervising school functions and activities.

Cross trained as cashier and wait staff in fast-paced restaurant. Cashing out all orders on the register and retrieving customer's items. Extensive cash handling in large amounts. Calculating using basic math to give appropriate amount of change to customers. Assisted in the training of all new employees. Delivered exceptional service to all customers in a timely and friendly manner inside dining room and pick up areas of the restaurant. Served all customer who were dining in their food as well as mixing all alcoholic and non-alcoholic.

skills.name: Pharmacy Operations
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in various pharmacy roles, including overnight pharmacy technician, pharmacy technician registry, IV technician, and certified pharmacy technician, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Medication Management
skills.explanation: Has consistently demonstrated ability to manage medications, including filling orders, compounding IV admixtures, and handling narcotics, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Sterile Compounding
skills.explanation: Has experience with sterile compounding of IV fluids using aseptic technique, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with taking inventory of medications, supplies, and narcotics, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in customer-facing roles, including cashier/server and administrative assistant, showing solid working proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience as a successful leader and team member, indicating solid working proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: HIPAA Compliance
skills.explanation: Has comprehensive knowledge about HIPAA laws, but limited experience in applying them, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Basic Math
skills.explanation: Has experience with basic math calculations, such as handling cash and calculating change, indicating some practical experience.
